metadata.description: Based on the most anticipated fighting game ever -- Street Fighter IV! New challengers like mixed martial artist Abel, Mexican wrestler El Fuerte, sexy spygal Crimson Viper, and chunky Kung Fu fighter Rufus cross paths with Street Fighter mainstays like Sakura, Dan, Charlie, and Akuma! Expect plenty of knock-down, drag-out action as the newest generation of world warriors proves they've got the skills to fight with the best!
metadata.name: Street Fighter IV
